name: Pictim
description:
Pictim is a game about a Pictim, trying to escape several Dungeons. The Pictim dont know how he get there and how to leave. 

I didnt had time during the GameJam to complete the Story Elements of my game, so its just a Puzzle, Adventure Game. You need to escape enemies and find the exit to get to the next level.

What to do and Controls are in the Option Menu of the game.

This game was made for the BTP GameJam 2021.
